Reviews.Title: Good camera package
Reviews.Author: soccermom
Reviews.Content: The camera is amazing and comes as if straight from Canon with owners books, software and a Canon battery.  The camera bag is very cheap quality and I purchased a new one.  I also bought this package for the extra $10 to get the full sized tripod and I was very disappointed with it.  Very flimsy.  All in all it is still a great package.  This camera is worth the deal with the extras that are usable.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Roxie C.
Reviews.Content: For only $10 more than what Walmart wanted for just the camera and basic lens I was able to get everything I needed plus some. Shipping was quick, everything works great is in perfect condition. Would definitely go through this seller again! Highly recommend them. I was also pleasantly surprised to learn that this is a family run business.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera!!
Reviews.Author: chandrakant
Reviews.Content: I love it!! All in one package, it includes almost every accessory to start with. Great deal and awesome camera to take pictue with l!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera, extras not necessary
Reviews.Author: Bobbi R Beito
Reviews.Content: It's nice to have everything that's included in this package. I found out that the quality of the items isn't the best, but it was nice to have it all when I was first starting out with the Rebel camera, not knowing how serious I would be with this hobby. As time goes on, and I upgrade certain things about my camera/accessories I slowly get rid of the items included in the package. The camera is amazing, everything else you could get by without.

Reviews.Title: Tons of functionaluity...
Reviews.Author: Aaron Johnson
Reviews.Content: Just about everything you need to start your camera hobby in one purchase!  LOVE IT! can't complain about a single thing!

Reviews.Title: T3i
Reviews.Author: Mike Shawgo "M. Shawgo"
Reviews.Content: a a a a a a  a a  a  aaaa a  aaa  aaaa great buy for the package would recommend

ProductInfo.Features:
Brand New w/All Supplied Accessories
18.0 MP CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor for high image quality and speed.
Improved EOS Full HD Movie mode with manual exposure control, expanded recording with new Movie Digital zoom
3.0-inch Vari-Angle Clear View LCD; Built-in flash; Full HD movie mode at 1920 x 1080 resolution
Compatible with full line of Canon EF and EF-S lenses
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera w/ 18-55mm IS II Lens Package 6
